property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: Little Kris enters this room from any of the former cave entrances once they have killed all the enemies on the board. A message that displays upon entering this room directs Little Kris to the northern part of the board, which holds an entrance to the [[Ice Palace]].

property.name: description
property.value: Little Kris enters this room from any of the former cave entrances if they failed to retrieve the [[Ice Key]] on the [[Desert Board (Sword Route)|Desert Board]]. A message displays telling them that they have forgotten it.

property.name: description
property.value: Is seen in an unreachable part of the room. He desperately wonders if they are doing the right thing by basing his games on the [[Sword Route]] boards. He flees once Little Kris attempts to approach.

property.name: description
property.value: A Purple Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming Little Kris when touched.

property.name: description
property.value: A Purple Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming Little Kris when touched.

property.name: description
property.value: A Purple Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming Little Kris when touched.

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Fish monster. Swims in the water, but lunges at Little Kris when approached.

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Fish monster. Swims in the water, but lunges at Little Kris when approached.

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Fish monster. Swims in the water, but lunges at Little Kris when approached.

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Fish monster. Swims in the water, but lunges at Little Kris when approached.

property.name: description
property.value: A Yellow Lizard. Attacks by shooting projectiles at Little Kris. Occasionally jumps to a predetermined spot in the area.

property.name: description
property.value: A Yellow Lizard. Attacks by shooting projectiles at Little Kris. Occasionally jumps to a predetermined spot in the area.

property.name: description
property.value: A stationary Flower. Attacks by shooting flashing projectiles at Little Kris.

property.name: description
property.value: A sword in what used to be the [[camera]] room. Allows Little Kris to kill the enemies on the board.

property.name: page
property.value: Sword (Sword Route)

property.name: description
property.value: A heart-shaped island. Contains an entrance to a secret room containing [[Tenna]].

property.name: page
property.value: Island Board (Sword Route)#Tropic of Love

property.name: description
property.value: A dungeon on the Island Board. Requires the [[Ice Key]] to enter, which is retrieved on the [[Desert Board (Sword Route)|Desert Board]].

property.name: page
property.value: Ice Palace
